name: Last Legs
description:
A puzzle-platformer game made for the Tri-Annual Game Jam #1 (https://itch.io/jam/tri-annual-jam)

The jam theme: You are your enemy

You take control of a dysfunctional robot that gets damaged by jumping. You must find a way to make it to the exit without killing yourself in the process.

The game is short, but it is also speedrun-friendly, with a built-in timer. Challenge your friends to beat your time, or simply strive to hone your own skills!

I had a blast making this and learned a lot from it. Every asset is made by me, from scratch. 

Have fun!
